lead_paragraph: A federal judge on Tuesday struck down a ban on same-sex marriage in Kentucky as a violation of the U.S. Constitution, the latest in a string of court rulings across the United States voiding state laws that restrict the right to marry.

headline.main: U.S. Court Strikes Down Kentucky Same-Sex Marriage Ban
headline.print_headline: U.S. Court Strikes Down Kentucky Same-Sex Marriage Ban

snippet: A federal judge on Tuesday struck down a ban on same-sex marriage in Kentucky as a violation of the U.S. Constitution, the latest in a string of court rulings across the United States voiding state laws that restrict the right to marry....
